message.content:
cs.AI, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.PL

Reasoning: 
1. cs.AI - The paper introduces a new problem in the field of General Video Game AI (GVGAI) and proposes a software framework for solving it. This falls under the scope of Artificial Intelligence.
2. cs.GT - The paper discusses the General Video Game AI competition, which involves designing agents that can play a wide range of video games. This falls under the scope of Game Theory.
3. cs.LG - The paper proposes a framework for generating game rules using the Video Game Description Language, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. This falls under the scope of Machine Learning.
4. cs.SD - The paper discusses the problem of generating complete games by breaking it down into smaller subproblems, which involves software design and development. This falls under the scope of Software Engineering.
5. cs.PL - The paper describes three different rule generators, which involves programming and algorithm design. This falls under the scope of Programming Languages.
